tasks.title: Issue with HT0822 Unloading and Volume Discrepancy
tasks.description: An operational error during truck unloading—caused by a valve not being opened—led to the pump running dry. This resulted in multiple incorrect delivery records and a fuel shortage of approximately 2,000 liters. Technical support (Veridapt) was contacted, canceled the erroneous transactions, and adjusted the volumes to correct the data.

tasks.title: Investigation of Tank Level Discrepancies
tasks.description: A significant discrepancy was found between the inlet meter readings and the tank level measurements. Despite deliveries being validated as complete, the tank level system consistently reports lower volumes—for example, a 34,000-liter delivery showing only 27,000 liters. It was concluded that the tank level measurement system is faulty, and repair or replacement has been requested.

tasks.title: Activities Handover and Reception Report - Valentina
tasks.description: On Friday, July 4th, a meeting was held to transfer Valentina's responsibilities: Activities, KPIs (only service reports), Inventory, KPIs + Fleet Maintenance + Fleet List, checking unauthorized transactions, and the schedule (Staff Plan) sent to Manicha. The handover was validated, and activities have been executed from the training date to present.
